name: Pawsitive Haven Shelter
description: Providing a safe and nurturing environment for abandoned pets in Mumbai.
volunteerOpportunities: Join us in caring for pets and organizing adoption events.

name: Stray Animal Foundation of India
description: Dedicated to the rescue and rehabilitation of stray animals in Navi Mumbai.
volunteerOpportunities: Help with animal care, training, and community programs.

name: Animal Welfare Trust
description: Rescue, rehabilitate, and rehome pets in Thane and surrounding areas.
volunteerOpportunities: Participate in shelter operations and outreach programs.

name: Pet Haven India
description: A dedicated shelter for abandoned pets offering medical care and rehoming services.
volunteerOpportunities: Assist with pet care and foster programs.

name: Animal Angels Shelter
description: Providing a safe haven for stray and abandoned animals in Kalyan.
volunteerOpportunities: Help with adoption events and animal rescue missions.

name: Happy Paws Sanctuary
description: Dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and abandoned pets.
volunteerOpportunities: Join us for animal care and community awareness programs.
